holes.original_proof:
calc
  x * e = (a * z) * e := by rw [h1]
  _ = a * (z * e) := by rw [h2]
  _ = a * (e * z) := by rw [h3]
  _ = (a * e) * z := by rw [h4]
  _ = a * z := by rw [h5]
  _ = x := by rw [h6]

calc
  a * (c * z) = (a * c) * z := by rw [mul_assoc]
  _ = (b * c) * z := by rw [habc]
  _ = b * (c * z) := by rw [mul_assoc]

calc
  a * e = a * (c * z) := by
    calc
      a * e = a * (c * z) := by rw [hz]
      _ = a * (c * z) := by rfl
  _ = b * (c * z) := by rw [h4]
  _ = b * e := by
    calc
      b * (c * z) = b * (c * z) := by rfl
      _ = b * e := by rw [hz]

calc
  a = a * e := by rw [h2]
  _ = b * e := by rw [h5]
  _ = b := by rw [h3]
